greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 2(a(n-2) - a(n-1)) + a(n-3) where a(0)=-3, a(1)=11 & a(2)=-30.
comment: Sequence relates bisections of Lucas and Fibonacci numbers.
link: Indranil Ghosh, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2383
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-3,-1).
formula: a(n) = (-1)^(n+1)*(3*L(2n+1)-F(2n)), where F(n) is the n-th Fibonacci number and L(n) is the n-th Lucas number. - _Rigoberto Florez_, Dec 24 2018
program: (MAGMA) I:=[-3,11]; [n le 2 select I[n] else -3*Self(n-1)-Self(n-2): n in [1..35]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 26 2018
results.author: _Creighton Dement_, Aug 29 2004
ext: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 04 2004
